description: This file implements a product catalog service with functions to list, retrieve, create, update, and remove products. It manages product data stored in a shared 'products' map and exposes an API for product management operations.

methods.name: list({ q, tag, page = 1, pageSize = 20 })
methods.description: Lists products with optional filtering by query and tag, supports pagination.

methods.name: getById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a product by its ID, throws error if not found or inactive.

methods.name: create({ name, description, price, currency = 'usd', imageUrl, tags = [], stock = 0 })
methods.description: Creates a new product with provided details, assigns unique ID and timestamps.

methods.name: update(id, patch)
methods.description: Updates existing product details by ID, updates timestamp.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Soft-deletes a product by setting its active flag to false.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^function create({ name, description, price, currency = 'usd', imageUrl, tags = [], stock = 0 }) /
ctags.signature: ({ name, description, price, currency = 'usd', imageUrl, tags = [], stock = 0 })

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^  const prod = { id, name, description, price, currency, imageUrl, tags, stock, active: true, cr/

fields.name: const prod = { id, name, description, price, currency, imageUrl, tags, stock, active: true, cr/
module.exports = { list, getById, create, update, remove };
